con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901/Account" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901/Account" xmlns:wsdlsoap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901"> <complexType name="SoapHeader"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="license" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="apiAccountId" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="apiAccountPassword" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="accountId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="onBehalfOfAccountId" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="onBehalfOfPassword" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SoapResponseHeader"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="service" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="timeTakenSeconds" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="requestTime" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Paging"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="startIndex" type="xsd:int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="numberResults" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Error"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="code" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="detail" type="tns:ErrorDetail"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ErrorDetail"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="requestKey" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="requestValue" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType abstract="true" name="Page"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="totalNumEntries" type="xsd:int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Page.Type" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType abstract="true" name="ReturnValue"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="operationSucceeded" type="xsd:boolean"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:Error"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType abstract="true" name="ListReturnValue"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ListReturnValue.Type" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Operation.Type" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema> <schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901/Account" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:adv="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901"/> <annotation> <appinfo> <version>201901</version> </appinfo> </annotation> <complexType name="AccountSelector"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="accountIds" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="accountTypes" type="tns:AccountType"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="accountStatuses" type="tns:AccountStatus"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="paging" type="adv:Paging"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="AccountPage"> <complexContent> <extension base="adv:Page"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="values" type="tns:AccountValues"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="AccountValues"> <complexContent> <extension base="adv:ReturnValue"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="account" type="tns:Account"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="Account"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="accountId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="accountName" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="accountType" type="tns:AccountType"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="accountStatus" type="tns:AccountStatus"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="deliveryStatus" type="tns:DeliveryStatus"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="budget" type="tns:AccountBudget"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="autoTaggingEnabled" type="tns:AutoTaggingEnabled"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="AccountBudget"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="amount" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="limitChargeType" type="tns:LimitChargeType"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="startDate" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="endDate" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="LimitChargeType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="SUM"/> <enumeration value="MONTHLY"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="AccountType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="PREPAY"/> <enumeration value="INVOICE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="DeliveryStatus"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <enumeration value="PAUSED"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="AccountStatus"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="INPROGRESS"/> <enumeration value="WAIT_DECIDE"/> <enumeration value="SUSPENDED"/> <enumeration value="SERVING"/> <enumeration value="ENDED"/> <enumeration value="CANCELED"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="AutoTaggingEnabled"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="FALSE"/> <enumeration value="TRUE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="AccountOperation"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:Operation"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="operand" type="tns:Account"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="AccountReturnValue"> <complexContent> <extension base="adv:ListReturnValue"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="values" type="tns:AccountValues"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType abstract="true" name="Operation"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="operator" type="tns:Operator"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="Operator"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="SET"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <element name="get"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="selector" type="tns:AccountSelector"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="rval" type="tns:AccountPage"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="adv:Error"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="mutate"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="operations" type="tns:AccountOperation"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="mutateResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="rval" type="tns:AccountReturnValue"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="adv:Error"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="RequestHeader" type="adv:SoapHeader"/> <element name="ResponseHeader" type="adv:SoapResponseHeader"/> <element name="ApiExceptionFault" type="xsd:string"/> </schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="RequestHeader"> <wsdl:part element="tns:RequestHeader" name="RequestHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResponseHeader"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ResponseHeader" name="ResponseHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:get" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="mutateRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:mutate" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="mutateResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:mutateResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ApiException"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ApiExceptionFault" name="ApiException"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="AccountServiceInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="get"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getRequest" name="getRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getResponse" name="getResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ApiException" name="ApiException"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="mutate"> <wsdl:input message="tns:mutateRequest" name="mutateRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:mutateResponse" name="mutateResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ApiException" name="ApiException"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="AccountServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:AccountServiceInterface"> <wsdlsoap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="get"> <wsdlsoap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getRequest"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns:RequestHeader" part="RequestHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getResponse"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns:ResponseHeader" part="ResponseHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ApiException"> <wsdlsoap:fault name="ApiException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="mutate"> <wsdlsoap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="mutateRequest"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns:RequestHeader" part="RequestHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="mutateResponse"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns:ResponseHeader" part="ResponseHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ApiException"> <wsdlsoap:fault name="ApiException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="AccountService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:AccountServiceSoapBinding" name="AccountService"> <wsdlsoap:address location="https://USE_ADDRESS_RETURNED_BY_LOCATION_SERVICE/services/V201901/AccountService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:acc="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901/Account" xmlns:v20="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <acc:RequestHeader>\r <v20:license>2755-9110-4041-8440</v20:license>\r <v20:apiAccountId>9452-9704-5517-3069</v20:apiAccountId>\r <v20:apiAccountPassword>Yj1Aml2017</v20:apiAccountPassword>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <v20:accountId>1026191</v20:accountId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <v20:onBehalfOfAccountId>BxrG1-g4Ag-LESrW-GPbq</v20:onBehalfOfAccountId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <v20:onBehalfOfPassword>hnbjYsrsRWOdQkpcbzbLQHjqXiqWlfOA</v20:onBehalfOfPassword>\r </acc:RequestHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <acc:get>\r <acc:selector>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <acc:accountIds>1026191</acc:accountIds>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <acc:accountTypes>INVOICE</acc:accountTypes>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <accountStatuses>INPROGRESS</accountStatuses> <accountStatuses>WAIT_DECIDE</accountStatuses> <accountStatuses>SUSPENDED</accountStatuses> <accountStatuses>SERVING</accountStatuses> <accountStatuses>ENDED</accountStatuses> <accountStatuses>CANCELED</accountStatuses> <!--Optional:-->\r <acc:paging>\r <v20:startIndex>1</v20:startIndex>\r <v20:numberResults>10</v20:numberResults>\r </acc:paging>\r </acc:selector>\r </acc:get>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
